ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: All that is said is, 'Peace! Peace!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: All talk will be sound and upright.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: except each other's greetings of, "Peace be with you".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But only the saying of: "Salaman! Salaman!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: (Naught) but the saying: Peace, (and again) Peace.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: only the words of peace and tranquillity.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Nought but the saying: peace! peace!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But only the saying of: Salam!, Salam! (greetings with peace)!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [56:26] but only the saying, ‘Peace!’ ‘Peace!’ (salāman salāman substitutes for qīlan, ‘the saying’) which they will hear.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: ((Naught) but the saying: Peace, (and again) Peace) they greet each other with the greeting peace and the angels also greet them with salutations and greeting of peace from their Lord.
